## Key Skills Acquired/Honed
**Role**: Electrical Engineer. 

**Technical Skills**: SMA Cables, Root Cause Analysis, GNU Radio, ArduPilot, Anechoic Chamber, ADALM Pluto SDR, Linux/Ubuntu, Terminal, MUSIC Algorithm, Navigation Algorithms for Drones, Xilinx ZC706 FPGA, AnalogDevices fmcomms5, Electronics Stack Configuration, Spectrum Analyzer, Signal Generators, Power Amplifiers, Oscilloscopes. 

**Soft Skills**: Stakeholder Management, Teamwork, Communication, Technical Communication, Time Management, Technical Presentation, Conflict Resolution.

**Certifications**: Commercial Drone Pilot FAA 107.
